message: I'm excited to offer you this premium product for $10000! It's a rare opportunity to get a high-quality item at a discounted price. I'm confident you'll love it and make the most of it. What do you say? Will you take it home today?
I'm not sure about this product, can I pass on it for now and see what the next one is?
